title: Frontend: Poll for subagent completion after stream ends
description: When the 'done' SSE event arrives and subagents are still 'running', start polling GET /api/sessions/:id/subagents every 3s until all subagents are completed/failed. Update SubagentPanel state accordingly.

title: Subagent panel stays stuck on 'running' after agent completes
description: The subagent_complete SSE event never reaches the frontend because it fires after the main agent stream (and SSE connection) has closed. Two-part fix needed: (1) Backend: keep SSE connection alive until spawned subagents complete, or use polling/separate endpoint. (2) Frontend: handle subagent lifecycle independently of the main stream.

title: Backend: notify() callback should persist subagent completion to DB
description: Move subagent_complete DB update logic from stream.ts into the agentBridgeService notify() callback, so completion is persisted regardless of whether the SSE stream is still open.

title: Backend: Add GET endpoint for subagent status polling
description: Add GET /api/sessions/:id/subagents that returns subagent records from DB. Frontend needs this to poll for completion after the main SSE stream closes.
